TITLE: ALTERNIA

TITLE: EARTH C
subtitle: better than ever
Game Text: During your Prep Phase, gain +1 Grist for every one of your #HUMAN cards here.

TITLE: EARTH C
subtitle: blank slate
Game Text: During your Prep Phase, choose one invader card here- that card looses all game text until the end of your score phase.
Pictures: HSATCG 3-12 Planets Destroyed_3.png // HSATCG 3-12 Planets Intact_3.png

TITLE: ALTERNIA
subtitle: a learned knack for cruelty
Game Text: During your Prep Phase, gain +1 Grist for every character card here with 5+ power.
Pictures: HSATCG 3-12 Planets Destroyed_4.png // HSATCG 3-12 Planets Intact_4.png

TITLE: EARTH C
subtitle: in full bloom
Game Text: During your Prep Phase, you may remove a boon from up to three character cards here. Any card that had a boon removed this way gains +1 Power until the end of your Score Phase.
Pictures: HSATCG 3-12 Planets Destroyed_5.png // HSATCG 3-12 Planets Intact_5.png

TITLE: ALTERNIA
subtitle: a vision of something better
Game Text: During your Prep Phase, before your draw, for every #ANCESTOR here you may look at one card on the top of your deck- and put it either on the bottom, or top of your deck.
Pictures: HSATCG 3-12 Planets Destroyed_6.png // HSATCG 3-12 Planets Intact_6.png

TITLE: LAND OF COLORS AND MAYHAM
subtitle: looming countdown
Game Text: During your score phase, you may remove a boon from one of your #LEPRECHAUN characters to destroy a moon here.
Pictures: HSATCG 3-12 Planets Destroyed_7.png // HSATCG 3-12 Planets Intact_7.png
